name: Gnash
description:
Honorbound Pack
The Gnash are a gnollish culture built upon the concept of the great, unending hunt. They value pack loyalty, shamanic wisdom, and never-ending vigilance.

options.name: Mark of the Hunt
options.description: You Mark a target you can see within 30 Units lasting until the end of a Full Rest. You gain +2 Movement Speed towards your target and deal an extra 1d10 Damage whenever you deal Physical Damage to them.

options.name: Oracle's Wisdom
options.description: Gain +1 Insight and you can interpret omens to gain hints about future dangers once per day.

options.name: Hunter's Instinct
options.description: Gain +1 Wildcraft and you can track creatures even days after they've passed.
